name: Glorious Enchant
active: Glory: Gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds. If used while near an ally champion, you and the nearest ally champion gain the effect (90 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Ability Haste. Active effect: Gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds. If used while near an ally champion, you and the nearest ally champion gain the effect (90 second cooldown).. Excellent for supporting allies and enhancing team capabilities.
tips: Perfect for enhancing your team's capabilities
Helps protect and empower your carries
The active/passive effect can turn the tide of team fights
The movement speed helps with roaming and map presence
Great for champions who need to reposition frequently in fights
